Package edu.missouri.drone.static_height

Class CombinatoryJiaoDrone

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mmkrusniak.drone.Drone
      • com.mmkrusniak.drone.static_height.OfflineDrone
        • com.mmkrusniak.drone.static_height.JiaoDrone
          • com.mmkrusniak.drone.static_height.CombinatoryJiaoDrone
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HuangDrone
    public class CombinatoryJiaoDrone
extends JiaoDrone
    An offline drone which splits complex polygons into simpler ones by splitting concave vertices, applying Jiao's cellular decomposition algorithm. This version also combines adjacent polygons that can be simply traversed together. It performs well but the decomposition is time-intensive.
